alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 5:36PM MST until July 16 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 536 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Canyon Lake, or 11 miles northeast of Apache Junction, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area and Tortilla Flat. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 193 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
